last_episode_to_air.name: The Grave
last_episode_to_air.overview: H.H. Holmes' grave is exhumed in an attempt to prove that he pulled off one final swindle and escaped his own execution.

name: American Ripper
overview: American serial killer H.H. Holmes has a dark legacy. Now, through his grandson's research, it may be that Holmes and Jack the Ripper are one in the same.

episodes.name: Devil in the Details
episodes.overview: Premiere of a series that investigates the possible connection between an American serial killer and England's Jack the Ripper

episodes.name: The Butcher's Blade
episodes.overview: While revealing the gruesome details of the murders committed in 1888 London by Jack the Ripper, Jeff and Amaryllis challenge Ripper myths in the hunt for a link to H.H. Holmes.

episodes.name: Whitechapel Runs Red
episodes.overview: The Jack the Ripper letters contain an unexpected link to H.H. Holmes; Scotland Yard's list of credible suspects holds a key detail about the manhunt; eyewitness accounts reveal the face of a killer.

episodes.name: Home Sweet Hell
episodes.overview: An investigation into the gruesome details of Holmes' infamous Murder Castle leads to the discovery that he may have been killing victims all over Chicago and beyond; a report says the Ripper may have killed in the United States.

episodes.name: Black Heart, White City
episodes.overview: Jeff and Amaryllis discover an unexpected connection to the Ripper in police archives while investigating the 1893 World's Fair that turned Chicago into H.H. Holme's killing ground.

episodes.name: Blood and Bone
episodes.overview: H.H. Holmes goes on the run as his schemes unravel; the investigation picks up on Holmes' trail with a long-lost crime scene that could hold the key to proving he's the Ripper.

episodes.name: No Rest for the Wicked
episodes.overview: A trove of mysterious artifacts contain an unexpected link to the U.K. Later, while investigating Holmesâ€™ capture and final days on the run, Jeff and Amaryllis find evidence of the Holmes curse and the theory that the killer escaped his own death.

episodes.name: The Grave
episodes.overview: H.H. Holmes' grave is exhumed in an attempt to prove that he pulled off one final swindle and escaped his own execution.
